# Welcome

Welcome to this interactive web-based R-book, specially crafted to recreate econometric examples featured in

Welcome to this interactive web-based R-book, designed to guide users through the process of replicating examples from Wooldridge's renowned textbook, "Introductory Econometrics: A Modern Approach. 6ed." This resource aims to enhance your understanding of econometric concepts and techniques by providing codes using the R programming language.

I hope the R-book serves as a valuable companion to Wooldridge's textbook, making econometrics more accessible and enjoyable through the power of R. Happy learning!
